items.title: Not content consumption
lines: IMAGO content is not for 'being browsed'
But for driving real participation and action

items.title: Open Connection
lines: No mutual follow needed, sharing, discussion and activities
More natural connections, not limited by social chains

items.title: Naturally Connected
lines: Short videos, live, discussions all lead to offline activities
Content is not isolated, but part of action

items.title: City Life
lines: IMAGO starts from cities and reality,
Serving real people, real scenes and real happenings

hatta.title: Hatta Corporation
hatta.description: Tokyo Hatta Business Co., Ltd. is located at Ichiban Uenoie, promoting service products of the corporation. With persistence, providing better customer service, pioneering creation and business, providing a place for modern people to create challenges.

imago.title: IMAGO
imago.description: IMAGO focuses on offline gathering as its core, adapting to the Internet era, reshaping community-level surrounding life. Service targets range from individuals to enterprises and entrepreneurs, promoting deep interaction and exchange.

tokyo.title: Tokyo
tokyo.description: Tokyo Hatta Business Co., Ltd. follows the product philosophy of 'Content as Entry, Action as Result', continuously exploring the integration of urban life, community collaboration, and digital platforms, committed to building sustainable online-offline integrated social infrastructure.

platform.title: IMAGO Platform
platform.description: Providing integrated online-offline social platform services, connecting users, event organizers, and local businesses to build a new urban lifestyle ecosystem.

events.title: Event Planning
events.description: From creative planning to execution, we provide professional offline event solutions for businesses and individuals.

marketing.title: Brand Marketing
marketing.description: Combining online content with offline experiences to create immersive brand experiences that enhance user engagement and brand influence.
